title: [IAP] Migration of Internal Applications
content:
It is planed to migrate some internal apps to a new server this Friday from 18:00 till 20:00. These apps (including DMP, KSP, EP, AMS, ITS, ITS-Admin and OE) will be unavailable during this period of time.

Let me know if you have any issues.

title: [IES] New cash advance function has been added into IES.
content: New cash advance function has been added into IES.

title: [IES] IES leave module has been updated.
content: IES leave module has been updated.
